articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: India's T20 World Cup Super 8 Schedule: Opponents, Dates, Match Timing, Venues - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India will face Australia, Afghanistan and Bangladesh, in the Super 8 stage of the 2024 T20 World Cup.
articles.content: The Super 8 stage of the 2024 T20 World Cup is set to get underway from June 19. Emotions will run high on June 24, as India take on Australia in a repeat of the 2023 World Cup Final. Team India qual… [+1540 chars]
